util:properties.prop: SELECT a.BORROWER_ID FROM (SELECT row_number () OVER (ORDER BY BORROWER_ID) rownumber,BORROWER_ID FROM memedaidb.FSS.LOANS WHERE CREDIT_DATE IS NOT NULL GROUP BY BORROWER_ID HAVING MAX (OVERDUE_DAYS) > 3 ) a WHERE rownumber BETWEEN ? AND ?

select * from (SELECT row_number () OVER (ORDER BY a.MEMBER_ID) as rownum, a.MEMBER_ID,a.MOBILE_NO,b.NAME,b.ID_NO,b.ID_PROVINCE as PROVINCE,b.ID_CITY as CITY FROM memedaidb.CRM.MEMBER a LEFT JOIN memedaidb.CRM.ID_CARD b ON a.MEMBER_ID = b.MEMBER_ID WHERE a.MOBILE_NO IS NOT NULL) a where a.rownum BETWEEN ? and ?

select * from (SELECT row_number () OVER (ORDER BY a.STOREID) as rownum,a.STOREID,a.MERCHANTID,a.STORENAME,a.PROVINCE,a.CITY,a.CREDIT_LIMIT_TYPE,b.POLICY_BRACKET,b.BUSINESS_FIRST_TYPE FROM MERCHANTAUDIT.mas.ma_store_baseinfo AS a LEFT JOIN MERCHANTAUDIT.mas.ma_execution_strategy AS b ON a.storeid = b.storeid) a where a.rownum between ? and ?

SELECT cellphone,member_id,apply_no,created_datetime,apply_status as original_status,case when apply_status=4000 then 1 when left(apply_status,2)=30 then 0 else null end as status,store_id,order_no FROM wallet.apply_info

SELECT mobile,member_id,order_no,created_datetime, case when status in ('1051','1081','1085') then 1 WHEN status in ('1011','1012') then null else 0 end as status,status as original_status,store_id,pay_amount/100 as pay_amount from wallet.money_box_order
SELECT APPL_NO,DEVICE_ID,IP,IP_CITY FROM memedaidb.APPL.A_APPL where device_id is not null or ip is not null limit ?,?
SELECT APPL_NO,DEVICE_ID FROM credit_audit.ca_appl_member_device where DEVICE_ID is not null
SELECT APPL_NO,IP,IP_CITY FROM credit_audit.ca_appl_member_device where IP is not null
SELECT ORDER_ID,DEVICE_ID from credit_trade_audit.cta_order_deviceinfo where device_id is not null
SELECT ORDER_ID,IP,IP_CITY from credit_trade_audit.cta_order_deviceinfo where ip is not null
SELECT PHONE_NO, PHONE_TYPE,SOURCE FROM credit_audit.ca_sys_phone_tag_merge where PHONE_NO is not null
select APPL_NO,PHONE_NO,CALL_CNT,CALL_LEN,CALL_IN_CNT,CALL_OUT_CNT,CREATE_TIME from credit_audit.ca_bur_operator_contact where PHONE_NO is not null
SELECT cellphone,apply_no FROM wallet.apply_info limit ?,?
select * from (SELECT row_number () OVER (ORDER BY REPORTNO) as rownum,REPORTNO, APPL_NO FROM watson.WTS.D_JXL_PERSON) a where a.rownum BETWEEN ? and ?
select cellphone from wallet.apply_info group by cellphone HAVING count(1)>1 limit ?,?
select max(ID) from credit_audit.ca_bur_operator_contact
update Member set isOverdue=true where memberId=?
update Member set isOverdue=false where isOverdue=true
update Member set memberId=?,name=?,idNo=?,province=?,city=?,phone=?,isBlack=false,isOverdue=false upsert return after where memberId=?
update Store set storeId=?,merchantId=?,storeName=?,province=?,city=?,creditLimitType=?,policyBracket=?,businessFirstType=? upsert return after where storeId = ?
update Apply set applyNo=?,status=?,originalStatus=?,createdDatetime=? upsert return after where applyNo=?
update Order set orderNo=?,status=?,originalStatus=?,amount=?,createdDatetime=? upsert return after where orderNo=?
delete edge {0}
select expand($c) from (select from V limit 1) let $a = (select expand(in_CallTo) from Phone where phone = ?), $b = (select expand(out_CallTo) from Phone where phone = ?), $c = unionall($a,$b)
update Device set deviceId=? upsert return after where deviceId=?
update Ip set ip=?,ipCity=? upsert return after where ip=?
update Phone set phone=? upsert return after where phone=?
select from Store where storeId=?
select from Member where memberId = ?
update PhoneMark set mark=? upsert return after where mark=?
create edge HasPhoneMark from {0} to {1}
update PhoneSource set source=? upsert return after where source=?
create edge HasPhoneSource from {0} to {1}
select from Device
select from Ip
create edge MemberHasApply from {0} to {1}
create edge PhoneHasApply from {0} to {1}
create edge ApplyHasDevice from {0} to {1}
create edge OrderHasDevice from {0} to {1}
create edge MemberHasDevice from {0} to {1}
create edge ApplyHasIp from {0} to {1}
create edge OrderHasIp from {0} to {1}
create edge MemberHasIp from {0} to {1}
create edge ApplyHasOrder from {0} to {1}
create edge PhoneHasOrder from {0} to {1}
create edge MemberHasOrder from {0} to {1}
create edge HasPhone from {0} to {1}
create edge ApplyHasStore from {0} to {1}
create edge OrderHasStore from {0} to {1}
create edge CallTo from {0} to {1} set callCnt = ?,callLen=?,callInCnt=?,callOutCnt=?,reportTime=?
create edge CallTo from {0} to {1} set callCnt = #callCnt,callLen=#callLen,callInCnt=#callInCnt,callOutCnt=#callOutCnt,reportTime=#reportTime retry 100 wait 100
update edge {0} set callCnt = ?,callLen=?,callInCnt=?,callOutCnt=?,reportTime=?
select from (select expand(out_CallTo) from {0}) where in = {1}
create edge HasPhone from {0} to {1}
